original: Theravāda Vinaya
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Mahāvibhaṅga
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga

original: Pācittiyakaṇḍa
analyzed: pācittiyakaṇḍa

original: Ratanavagga
analyzed: ratana vagga

original: 84. Ratanasikkhāpada
analyzed: ratana sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aciravatiyā nadiyā nahāyati. Aññataropi brāhmaṇo pañcasatānaṁ thavikaṁ thale nikkhipitvā aciravatiyā nadiyā nahāyanto vissaritvā agamāsi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu aciravatiyā nadiyā nahāyati aññataraḥ api brāhmaṇaḥ pañca satānam thavikam thale nikkhipitvā aciravatiyā nadiyā nahāyantaḥ vissaritvā agamāsi

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu—“tassāyaṁ brāhmaṇassa thavikā, mā idha nassī”ti aggahesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhutassa ayam brāhmaṇassa thavikā mā idha nassi iti aggahesi

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo saritvā turito ādhāvitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—“api me, bho, thavikaṁ passeyyāsī”ti?
analyzed: atha kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ saritvā turitaḥ ādhāvitvā tam bhikkhum etat avoca api me bho thavikam passeyyāsi iti

original: “Handa, brāhmaṇā”ti adāsi.
analyzed: handa brāhmaṇāti adāsi

original: Atha kho tassa brāhmaṇassa etadahosi—“kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena imassa bhikkhuno puṇṇapattaṁ na dadeyyan”ti.
analyzed: atha kho tassa brāhmaṇassa etat ahosikena nu kho aham upāyena imassa bhikkhuno puṇṇa pattam na dadeyyanti

original: “Na me, bho, pañcasatāni, sahassaṁ me”ti palibundhetvā muñci.
analyzed: na me bho pañca satāni sahassam mā iti palibundhetvā muñci

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu ārāmam gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu ratanaṁ uggahessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu ratanam uggahessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, ratanaṁ uggahesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu ratanam uggahesi iti

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe…
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, ratanaṁ uggahessasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa ratanam uggahessasi

original: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā ussavo hoti. Manussā alaṅkatappaṭiyattā uyyānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyāḥ ussavaḥ hoti manussāḥ alaṅkata paṭiyattāḥ uyyānam gacchanti

original: Visākhāpi migāramātā alaṅkatappaṭiyattā “uyyānaṁ gamissāmī”ti
analyzed: visākhā api migāra mātā alaṅkata paṭiyattā uyyānam gamissāmi iti

original: gāmato nikkhamitvā—“kyāhaṁ karissāmi uyyānaṁ gantvā, yannūnāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ payirupāseyyan”ti
analyzed: gāmataḥ nikkhamitvā akya aham karissāmi uyyānam gantvā yat nūna aham bhagavantam payis upāseyyanti

original: ābharaṇaṁ omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikaṁ bandhitvā dāsiyā adāsi—“handa, je, imaṁ bhaṇḍikaṁ gaṇhāhī”ti.
analyzed: ābharaṇam omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikam bandhitvā dāsiyā a dāsi handa imam bhaṇḍikam gaṇhāhi iti

original: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu visākhā migāra mātā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho visākham migāra mātaram bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi

original: samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi. Atha kho visākhā migāramātā bhagavatā dhammiyā
analyzed: samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi atha kho visākhā migāra mātā bhagavatā dhammiyā

original: kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
analyzed: kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā

original: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho sā dāsī taṁ bhaṇḍikaṁ vissaritvā agamāsi.
analyzed: atha kho sā dāsī tam bhaṇḍikam vissaritvā agamāsi

original: Bhikkhū passitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. “Tena hi, bhikkhave, uggahetvā nikkhipathā”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhū passitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu tena hi bhikkhave uggahetvā nikkhipatha ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā ajjhārāme uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipituṁ—‘yassa bhavissati so harissatī’ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitu yassa bhavissati saḥ harissati iti

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā, aññatra ajjhārāmā, uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā aññatra uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena kāsīsu janapade anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa kammantagāmo hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena kāsīsu janapade anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa kammanta gāmaḥ hoti

original: Tena ca gahapatinā antevāsī āṇatto hoti—“sace bhadantā āgacchanti, bhattaṁ kareyyāsī”ti.
analyzed: tena ca gahapatinā antevāsī āṇattaḥ hoti sace bhadantāḥ āgacchanti bhattam kareyyāsi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu janapade cārikaṁ caramānā yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa kammantagāmo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū kāsīsu janapade cārikam caramānāḥ yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa kammanta gāmo tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Addasā kho so puriso te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante. Disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: addasā kho so puriso te bhikkhū dūratas vas āgacchante disvāna yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū abhivādetvā etadavoca—“adhivāsentu, bhante, ayyā svātanāya
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū abhivādetvā etat avoca adhivāsentu bhante ayyā svātanāya

original: gahapatino bhattan”ti.
analyzed: gahapatinaḥ

original: Adhivāsesuṁ kho te bhikkhū tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesum kho te bhikkhū tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho so puriso tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā kālaṁ ārocāpetvā aṅgulimuddikaṁ omuñcitvā te bhikkhū bhattena parivisitvā—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ tassā rattiyāḥ accayena paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā kālam ārocāpetvā aṅguli muddikam omuñcitvā te bhikkhū bhattena parivisitvā

original: “ayyā bhuñjitvā gacchantu, ahampi kammantaṁ gamissāmī”ti aṅgulimuddikaṁ vissaritvā agamāsi.
analyzed: ayyāḥ bhuñjitvā gacchantu aham pi kammantam gamissāmi iti aṅguli muddikam vissaritvā agamāsi

original: Bhikkhū passitvā—“sace mayaṁ gamissāma nassissatāyaṁ aṅgulimuddikā”ti tattheva acchiṁsu.
analyzed: bhikkhū passitvā asace mayam gamissāma aṅguli muddikā ati tattha iva

original: Atha kho so puriso kammantā āgacchanto te bhikkhū passitvā etadavoca—“kissa, bhante, ayyā idheva acchantī”ti?
analyzed: atha kho so purisaḥ kammantāḥ āgacchantaḥ te bhikkhū passitvā etat avoca kissa bhante ayyāḥ idha iva acchanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū tassa purisassa etamatthaṁ ārocetvā
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū tassa purisassa etam attham ārocetvā

original: sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: sāvatthim gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipituṁ—
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitu

original: ‘yassa bhavissati so harissatī’ti.
analyzed: yassa bhavissati saḥ harissati iti

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā, aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā, uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā pācittiya

original: Ratanaṁ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṁ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṁ—‘yassa bhavissati so harissatī’ti. Ayaṁ tattha sāmīcī”ti.
analyzed: ratanam vā pana bhikkhunā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipita bayassa bhavissati saḥ harissati iti ayam tattha sāmīcī iti

original: Yo panāti
analyzed: yaḥ panāti

original: yo yādiso …pe…
analyzed: yaḥ ya ādisaḥ pe

original: bhikkhūti
analyzed: bhikkhū ti

original: …pe… ayaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
analyzed: pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: Ratanaṁ nāma
analyzed: ratanam nāma

original: muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavālaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅko masāragallaṁ.
analyzed: muttā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ saṅkhaḥ silā pavālam rajatam jātarūpam lohitaṅkaḥ masāragalla

original: Ratanasammataṁ nāma
analyzed: ratanasammatam nāma

original: yaṁ manussānaṁ upabhogaparibhogaṁ, etaṁ ratanasammataṁ nāma.
analyzed: yam manussānam upabhoga paribhoge etam ratanasammatam nāma

original: Aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vāti
analyzed: aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā ati

original: ṭhapetvā ajjhārāmaṁ ajjhāvasathaṁ.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ajjhārāmam ajjhāvasatha

original: Ajjhārāmo nāma
analyzed: ajjhārāmaḥ nāma

original: parikkhittassa ārāmassa anto ārāmo, aparikkhittassa upacāro.
analyzed: parikkhittassa ārāmassa antaḥ ārāmaḥ aparikkhittassa upacāraḥ

original: Ajjhāvasatho nāma
analyzed: ajjhāvasathaḥ nāma

original: parikkhittassa āvasathassa anto āvasatho, aparikkhittassa upacāro.
analyzed: parikkhittassa āvasathassa antaḥ āvasathaḥ aparikkhittassa upacāraḥ

original: Uggaṇheyyāti
analyzed: uggaṇheyya ati

original: sayaṁ gaṇhāti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sayam gaṇhāti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Uggaṇhāpeyyāti
analyzed: uggaṇhāpeyya ati

original: aññaṁ gāhāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: aññam gāhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ratanaṁ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṁ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbanti
analyzed: ratanam vā pana bhikkhunā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbanti

original: rūpena vā nimittena vā saññāṇaṁ katvā nikkhipitvā ācikkhitabbaṁ—“yassa bhaṇḍaṁ naṭṭhaṁ so āgacchatū”ti.
analyzed: rūpena vā nimittena vā saññāṇam katvā nikkhipitvā ācikkhitabbayassa bhaṇḍam naṭṭham saḥ āgacchatu uti

original: Sace tattha āgacchati so vattabbo—“āvuso, kīdisaṁ te bhaṇḍan”ti?
analyzed: sace tattha āgacchati saḥ vattabbo āvuso kīdisam te bhaṇḍanti

original: Sace rūpena vā nimittena vā sampādeti dātabbaṁ, no ce sampādeti “vicināhi, āvuso”ti vattabbo.
analyzed: sace rūpena vā nimittena vā sampādeti no ce sampādeti vicināhi āvuso ti vattabbaḥ

original: Tamhā āvāsā pakkamantena ye tattha honti bhikkhū patirūpā, tesaṁ hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tamhā āvāsā pakkamantena ye tattha honti bhikkhū patirūpā tesam hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabba

original: No ce honti bhikkhū patirūpā, ye tattha honti gahapatikā patirūpā, tesaṁ hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: no ce honti bhikkhū patirūpāḥ ye tattha honti gahapatikā patirūpā tesam hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabba

original: Ayaṁ tattha sāmīcīti
analyzed: ayam sāmīcī iti

original: ayaṁ tattha anudhammatā.
analyzed: ayam tattha anudhamma tā

original: Anāpatti—
analyzed: anāpatti

original: ratanaṁ vā ratanasammataṁ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipati—“yassa bhavissati so harissatī”ti,
analyzed: ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipati yassa bhavissati saḥ harissati iti

original: ratanasammataṁ vissāsaṁ gaṇhāti, tāvakālikaṁ gaṇhāti, paṁsukūlasaññissa,
analyzed: ratana sammatam vissāsam gaṇhāti tāvakālikam gaṇhāti pasukūla saññissa

original: ummattakassa,
analyzed: ummattakassa

original: ādikammikassāti.
analyzed: ādikammikassa ati

original: Ratanasikkhāpadaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: ratana sikkhāpadam niṭṭhitam dutiya
